oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Public reactions to utilization of everyman's rights in wild berry business
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Peltola, Rainer
Hallikainen, Ville
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We investigated attitudes concerning recruiting of foreign wild berry pickers in Finland. The survey was directed for nature-orientated people, as 92 % of respondents (n=495) picked wild berries for household use (80 %) or incomes (12 %).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Peltola, Rainer and Hallikainen, Ville (2010) Public reactions to utilization of everyman's rights in wild berry business. In: Circumpolar agricultural and land use resources - prospects and perspectives for circumpolar productions and industries : abstract booklet, Bioforsk, p. 33.
